pullRequest.title: Add view values to lookup actions menu
pullRequest.bodyText: On the look ups page you can now click on the magnifying glass icon to view the key value pairs of that lookup.

nodes.bodyText: A lookup can have lots and lots of values in it, also what if the columns change? I would recommend doing SELECT k, v instead of * and also adding a LIMIT 5000 or something

commit.message: add limit, explicitly get columns, remoove map
